definition: "water" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 85), occurring in 没, 法, 流 etc/see also 三點水|三点水[san1 dian3 shui3]
to moisten with spittle (idiom); sharing meager resources/mutual help in humble circumstances
to dip the pen into ink/to write
to help each other out in hard times (idiom)

sentences.english: Will I have the opportunity to study abroad?
sentences.chinese: 我有沒有到外國大學浸濡學習的機會？

sentences.english: Nure-onna is typically seen at the water's edge, washing her long, flowing hair.
sentences.chinese: 人們通常會在水邊看見濡女清洗她長而柔順的頭髮。

sentences.english: Moisten it a bit if you have enough water.
sentences.chinese: 濡有點如果您有足夠的水。

sentences.english: Nure-onna is typically seen at the water’s edge, washing her long, flowing hair.
sentences.chinese: 人們通常會在水邊看見濡女清洗她長而柔順的頭髮。

sentences.english: I can but rush to the surf and let it drench me and freeze upon me.
sentences.chinese: 我只能跳到澎湃的浪裏，讓它浸濡我並且使我寒慄。

sentences.english: In some stories, she carries a small child, which she uses to attract potential victims.
sentences.chinese: 有些傳說中，濡女會帶個小孩去吸引潛在受害人。

sentences.english: Dip into the bottle filled in speech &drama dew to mom.
sentences.chinese: 蘸濡露水盛入瓶中給媽媽喝。

sentences.english: Wet spleen Yang, wet deterring jersey and xie speech &drama, is see shit reverse quickly.
sentences.chinese: 溼傷脾陽，溼遏濡澤而瀉，故見大便反快。

definition: to hold/to embrace/to wrap around/to gather around (sb)/to throng/to swarm/to support/Taiwan pr. [yong3]
therefore/consequently/thus/hence/thereupon/it follows that/where?/to change (into)/ancient unit of weight and money
